thread.title: Dairy Queen offers free ice cream cones Monday to welcome spring
thread.title_full: Dairy Queen offers free ice cream cones Monday to welcome spring

author: Associated Press
title: Dairy Queen offers free ice cream cones Monday to welcome spring
text:
Dairy Queen offers free ice cream cones Monday to welcome spring Associated Press 1 hr ago ( â€¦ ) 
Dairy Queen is offering free ice cream cones on Monday on the first day of spring. 
Anyone who wants a treat can stop by participating non-mall locations Monday for a free small vanilla soft serve cone. 
Dairy Queens will also be collecting donations for Children's Miracle Network Hospitals on Monday. 
Over the past 32 years, Dairy Queen restaurants have raised more than $120 million for the hospitals. Tags
